name: webtask
description: Project assessment for TangoCode's Junior Software Engineer position.

scripts.localtest: createdb test_webtask && psql test_webtask < src/api/webtask_schema.sql &> /dev/null && mocha --compilers js:babel-register test/*/*.js*; dropdb test_webtask
scripts.test: psql test_webtask < src/api/webtask_schema.sql &> /dev/null && DEVELOPMENT=testing mocha --compilers js:babel-register tests/*/*.js*
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:img && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:img & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp src/public/index.html src/public/build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar src/public/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'src/public/css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:img: npm run clean:img && cp -r src/public/img/ src/public/build/img/

author: Sierra Gregg
